segments.text: Good morning . What's the matter with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , doctor . I have a terrible headache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , young man . Tell me how it got started .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yesterday I had a runny nose . Now my nose is stuffed up . I have a sore throat . And I â€™ m afraid I've got a temperature . I feel terrible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry , young man . Lat me give you an examination . First let me take a look at your throat . Open your mouth and say'ah ' .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your throat is inflamed . And your tongue is heavily coated . You have all the symptoms of influenza .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What am I supposed to do then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A good rest is all you need , and drink more water . I'll write you a prescription .
segments.speaker: S1
